response.original_title: Hootie & The Blowfish - Cracked Rear View Blu-ray Audio
response.overview: CRACKED REAR VIEW includes Dolby Atmos, Dolby 5.1 Surround Sound, and PCM 24/96 High Resolution Stereo mixes. The band’s 1994 debut was a No.1 smash in the U.S., where it’s been certified Double Diamond by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). The single “Let Her Cry” garnered a Grammy® Award in 1996 for Best Pop Performance by a Duo or Group with Vocals.  Track listing: "Hannah Jane" "Hold My Hand" "Let Her Cry" "Only Wanna Be with You" "Running from an Angel"  "I'm Goin' Home"  "Drowning"  "Time" "Look Away"  "Not Even the Trees"  "Goodbye"
response.title: Hootie & The Blowfish - Cracked Rear View Blu-ray Audio
